parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
From kata and luo; to loosen down, i.e. to demolish; specially to halt for the night.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides. From a primary naio; a fane, shrine, temple.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
